title: Nora
body:
<<if visited ("Nora") is false>>
Hello? Who is it?
[[I am Detective Schmidt. I'd like to speak with you Miss Hastings.|Nora.Greet.Avoiding]]
[[Miss Hastings, this is the police. I'd like to speak to you.|Nora.Greet.Cautious]]
<<else>>
Yes, Detective?
<<endif>>

title: Nora.Greet.Avoiding
body:
Hello Detective.
I'm sorry, but I'm very busy right now. Can this wait?
[[I'm sorry, but this is urgent. It's about Jacob Wright|Nora.Greet.Jacob]]
[[I'm running out of patience, Miss Hastings. Open the door|Nora.Greet.Scared]]

title: Nora.Greet.Cautious
body:
...
Alright then, let me unlock the door.

title: Nora.Greet.Jacob
body:
I'll save you some time. He's a bastard, and we're not seeing each other anymore.
He can rot in hell for all I care.
[[Funny you should say that. I'm investigating Jacob's death|Nora.Greet.Avoid2]]
[[Please Miss Hastings, I'd rather not have this conversation through a door|Nora.Greet.Willing]]

title: Nora.Greet.Willing
body: Ugh. Fine. But make it quick.

title: Nora.Greet.Avoid2
body:
Listen, I've told you everything I know.
Just leave me alone.
[[I've had about enough of this. Open the door!|Nora.Greet.Scared]]
